name: Run Sackboy! Run!
description:
Get ready to run like the wind as Sackboy® sets off on a blistering adventure with the nasty Negativitron nipping at his heels.

• Collect chains of bubbles, find exciting power-ups and unlock new costumes.
• Buy bubble packs to spend on new items and purchase Save Me hearts for extra lives.

Plus
Collect stickers to unlock an exclusive Run Sackboy! Run! T-shirt for Sackboy® to wear in LBP™2, LBP™3, LBP™ Karting, and LBP™ PS Vita – plus costumes for Sackboy®, OddSock, Toggle and Swoop in LBP™3 on PS3™ and PS4™.

Important
• Download this game for free. You can play it without making in-game purchases but optional in-game purchases are available from PlayStation®Store that may enhance your gameplay experience.

1 player(s)
100KB Minimum
